questions.question: Elements in the same <u>group</u> of the periodic table have the same number of:
questions.explanation: Elements in the same group have similar chemical properties due to the same number of valence electrons.

questions.question: The <u>molecular formula</u> of water is:
questions.explanation: Water consists of two hydrogen atoms bonded to one oxygen atom, giving the molecular formula H2O.

questions.question: The <u>atomic number</u> of an element represents the number of:

options.text: Protons and neutrons in the nucleus

questions.question: A solution with pH 3 is:
questions.explanation: Solutions with pH less than 7 are acidic, pH greater than 7 are basic, and pH 7 is neutral.
